bullet: Using EC2 instance to deploy full-stack web applications
Using VPS to set up a server to run REST API
Setting up basic Linux server, connecting via SSH and maintaining server and its apps
name: AWS
desc: I've primarily used the AWS EC2 technology, which is a virtual private server (VPS) that allows for virtualization of a server operating system. I've ran a couple of these with Linux Ubuntu Server, and used them to deploy full-stack web applications and REST API's to remote cloud-based servers.
